text:
More glimmers of hope as we “safely” move forward and open up Texas while containing #COVID19. 

Texas A&M, Texas Tech University & the University of Texas systems expect to reopen in the fall. 

A&M is talking about playing football.  https://t.co/xFEcx2gup1
